body:
THE DOWNLOAD
Your weekly AI & tech newsletter
Issue #47 - October 23, 2025

ðŸ“° TOP STORIES THIS WEEK

1. GPT-5 Speculation Heats Up
OpenAI hints at next-generation model with improved reasoning capabilities. Sources say training began in Q3 2025. Expected launch: early 2026.

2. EU AI Act Goes Into Effect
New regulations require transparency in AI-generated content and model training data disclosure. US companies scramble to comply.

3. GitHub Copilot X Gets Major Upgrade
New features include voice-to-code, AI code reviews, and context-aware suggestions across entire codebases.

ðŸ”® WHAT'S NEXT

Next week: Interview with Anthropic's CEO on Claude's future, plus a deep dive into multi-modal AI applications.

Happy coding!
The TechCrunch Team
